normalized_name.description: Normalized Swedish product name without brand/model/color/size (e.g., 'Cylinder' not 'Cylinder 70cc Polini för Yamaha DT50')

short_description.description: Short Swedish description (100-150 characters) for listings

description.description: Detailed Swedish description (300-500 words) with SEO optimization

primary_category.description: Primary category from categories.json (e.g., 'Styren & Reglage', 'Motordelar & Filter')

value.description: Attribute value (string for enum, number for numeric attributes)

attributes.description: Product attributes using ONLY those defined in attributes.json

fitment_summary.description: Human-readable fitment text from product-fitments.jsonl (e.g., 'Passar Baotian City, Classic, Ghost, Retro, Sport, Sprint')

is_variant_candidate.description: True if this product should be a variant of another product (differs only in color, size, material, etc.)

variant_parent_sku.description: SKU of suggested parent product if this is a variant

requires_human_review.description: True if AI is uncertain and human review is recommended

confidence_score.description: AI confidence score 0-1 based on data completeness and certainty

enriched_products.description: A list of enriched motorcycle/moped product objects.
